title: Please find me some good video game music for the next several hours of work
description: I'd have loved to delve into some Next Fest shenanigans, but at the moment guidestown is groaning with work. And there are only so many times I can listen to the Endless Legend soundtrack in one day. I need to expand my horizons. Read more
author: Ollie Toms
excerpt: I am in desperate need of some more chill video game music to listen to while working. What are your suggestions?
text: Image credit: Amplitude I'd have loved to delve into some Next Fest shenanigans, but at the moment guidestown is groaning with work. And there are only so many times I can listen to the Endless Legend soundtrack in one day. I need to expand my horizons. Come on, let loose. I need all your best game soundtrack recommendations for background music while I work. Nothing intense, no combat music, nothing too distracting. Just a nice vibe. Something to get lost in over time. Now gimme what you got! It's urgent!
html:
I'd have loved to delve into some Next Fest shenanigans, but at the moment guidestown is groaning with work. And there are only so many times I can listen to the Endless Legend soundtrack in one day. I need to expand my horizons.

Come on, let loose. I need all your best game soundtrack recommendations for background music while I work. Nothing intense, no combat music, nothing too distracting. Just a nice vibe. Something to get lost in over time. Now gimme what you got! It's urgent!
